sentence.Network_en: They would have liked bare wooden floors throughout the house.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们本想在整个房间的木地板上都不铺地毯的。

sentence.Network_en: He maintained an ambivalent attitude to the Church throughout his long life.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他漫长的一生中，他对基督教信仰始终是一种摇摆不定的态度。

sentence.Network_en: This is happening in every school throughout the country.
sentence.Network_cn: 全国各地每所学校都在发生这样的事情。

entry.tran: 自始至终;从头到尾;贯穿
entry.def: If you say that something happens throughout a particular period of time, you mean that it happens during the whole of that period.

example.ex: The national tragedy of rival groups killing each other continued throughout 1990...
example.tran: 敌对派别相互残杀的国家悲剧 1990 年全年都在上演。

example.ex: Movie music can be made memorable because its themes are repeated throughout the film.
example.tran: 电影音乐要想让人记住不难，因为它的主旋律贯穿影片始终。

entry.def: If you say that something happens or exists throughout a place, you mean that it happens or exists in all parts of that place.

example.ex: 'Sight Savers', founded in 1950, now runs projects throughout Africa, the Caribbean and South East Asia...
example.tran: 创始于 1950 年的国际防盲及救盲组织如今在非洲、加勒比海地区和东南亚各地都开展项目。

example.ex: As we have tried to show throughout this book, companies that provide outstanding service don't do it by luck.
example.tran: 正如我们一直想在本书中努力表明的那样，提供优质服务的公司靠的不是运气。

Sentence.sentence: Many societies throughout history and around the world today have cultivated strong pressures to stay married.
It encourages students to learn throughout their lives.
An Ohio State University study also found that black students living with a white roommate saw higher academic success throughout their college careers.
Social learning theories contribute to our understanding of why we behave as we do, but much of the emphasis is on early socialization rather than on what occurs throughout life.
change the weather patterns throughout the world
Muir's learning in observation throughout his life led him to devote his last years to preserving the natural environment.

sentences.en: It poured with rain throughout the night.
They sang songs throughout the trip.
sentences.cn: 整个旅途中他们歌声不断。

jushi.chinese: 到二月底全国的学校都开学了。
